title: Setup pre-commit hooks
description: Configure pre-commit with hooks for Ruff, mypy, trailing whitespace, YAML/JSON validation, and merge conflict detection. Create .pre-commit-config.yaml with all quality checks to run before commits.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Setup pre-commit hooks:

**Configuration (.pre-commit-config.yaml):**
- pre-commit-hooks (v5.0.0):
  - trailing-whitespace: Remove trailing whitespace
  - end-of-file-fixer: Ensure files end with newline
  - check-yaml: Validate YAML syntax
  - check-toml: Validate TOML syntax
  - check-json: Validate JSON syntax
  - check-merge-conflict: Detect merge conflicts
  - check-added-large-files: Prevent large files (>1MB)

- Ruff (v0.14.4):
  - ruff: Linting with auto-fix
  - ruff-format: Code formatting

- Mypy (v1.18.2):
  - Type checking on src/ files only
  - Additional dependencies: types-setuptools

**Installation:**
- Hooks installed at .git/hooks/pre-commit

**Verification:**
- Ran on all files: Fixed trailing whitespace and EOF issues
- All checks passing: YAML, TOML, JSON, Ruff, Mypy
- Ready for automatic pre-commit validation
